inputs.description: -brank bbb   Set the 'base' rank to 'bbb' instead of 1. (You could also do this with 3dcalc.)
inputs.name: BRANK

inputs.description: -mask mset   Means to use the dataset 'mset' as a mask: Only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be used from 'dataset'.  Voxels outside the mask will get rank 0.
inputs.name: MASK

inputs.description: -prefix ppp  Write results into float-format dataset 'ppp' Output is in float format to allow for non-integer ranks resulting from ties.
inputs.name: PREFIX

inputs.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the dataset x 100.0
inputs.name: PERCENTIZE

inputs.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the mask x 100.0  Author: RW Cox  [[a quick hack for his own purposes]]  ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: PERCENTIZE_MASK
